page.title: 18THE DOMESDAY PROJECT - POEM
page.content:
The Domesday project is finding out That means we're always out and about We've found out about lots of things And every visit we're questioning. The people give us a sheet And ask "would you like a seat?" We've been round Dowell Street And been to Hooks, with lots of meat, We also went to Heathpark Some shops were still dark We drew both sides of the High Street, Some houses were messy but others were neat, The colour of Dominoes is nice But the wall hasn't a dice All in all our Domesday work is nice.
{Sarah Woodruff age 10 {
